name: Pride & Pistols
description:
It's a standoff at high noon. You know what to do.

CONTROLS

Xbox Controller:

X = dodge

A = shoot

B = taunt

Keyboard:

Player 1 (left):

  • Z = dodge
  • X = shoot
  • C = taunt

Player 2 (right):

  • , = dodge
  • . = shoot
  • / = taunt

THERE CAN ONLY BE ONE CONTEXTUALLY IMPROBABLE PRINCESS

@chris_saunders

@mathewhijazi

@breakfeast

Audio by TJ Burton
